entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Developer of 'Cartes & Données', a proprietary dynamic modeling tool for iterative data analysis. The tool is a no-code solution using a dedicated metalanguage, designed to be widely accessible by any user across the enterprise.

entities.transactionPerimeter: Concerns Articque, with ChapsVision also mentioned in the project context.

entities.name: Cartes & Données
entities.description: Articque's proprietary dynamic modeling tool. It features an intuitive, graphic, and ergonomic interface for iterative analysis of multiple interactive data layers, combining selected statistical data with basemaps. Designed as a no-code solution supported by a dedicated metalanguage, making it widely accessible. The design process (Source: Management for design process details) is staged into 4 main steps (Choose basemap and import location data; Apply desired statistical & data science processing; Pick most appropriate representation; Display output in the web interface) and 2 extra iterative steps for further analysis (What-If scenario analysis, Creation of business applications).

entities.name: No-code Development
entities.description: The design principle for Articque's dynamic modeling tool (Cartes & Données), enabling use by any user across the enterprise without coding.

entities.name: Dedicated Metalanguage
entities.description: Supports the no-code functionality of Articque's dynamic modeling tool (Cartes & Données).

entities.name: Basemaps Integration
entities.description: Cartes & Données combines statistical data with basemaps for geospatial analysis and allows choosing basemaps and importing location data.

entities.name: Statistical Data Analysis
entities.description: Core feature of Cartes & Données, allowing iterative analysis of selected statistical data sets.

entities.name: Data Science Processing
entities.description: A step in the workflow of using Cartes & Données, applied to data for analysis and representation.

entities.name: Iterative Data Analysis
entities.description: A primary use case for Cartes & Données, enabling analysis of multiple interactive data layers.

entities.name: What-If scenario analysis
entities.description: An advanced analysis capability offered by Cartes & Données as part of its iterative process for further analysis.

entities.name: Creation of business applications
entities.description: Users can create business applications using Cartes & Données, as part of its iterative analytical process for further analysis.

entities.name: C&D ONLINE
entities.description: Online component or version of Articque's Cartes & Données solution, likely the web interface for displaying output from the analysis.

entities.name: ARTICQUE PLATFORM
entities.description: The overarching platform from Articque, likely encompassing Cartes & Données and C&D ONLINE.
